name.title: Company Name
name.desc: Use the official company name from the business registration certificate.
name.inputTitle: It must be characters 2-50 and can only contain letters, numbers, periods, comma, ampersand and parentheses.

shortDescription.title: Company Short Description
shortDescription.desc: Describe your company in 150 characters or less.
shortDescription.placeholder: Factory Hunt is a global B2B platform.
shortDescription.inputTitle: It must be characters 2-150 and can only contain letters, numbers, periods, comma, hyphens and apostrophe.

video.title: Company Introduction Video
video.desc: Please copy and paste only YouTube link.

description.title: Company Description
description.placeholder: Factory Hunt is a global B2B platform.
description.inputTitle: It must be less than 25000 digits.

company.title: Company Information
company.desc: Please fill out the information below.

products.title: Products
products.inputTitle: It must be 1-200 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, comma, hyphens, parenthesis and apostrophe.

website.title: Website
website.inputTitle: It must be 1-100 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, slash and periods.

phone.title: Phone
phone.inputTitle: It must be 1-21 characters and can only contain numbers, plus, and hyphens.

averageLeadTime.title: Average Lead Time (Days)
averageLeadTime.inputTitle: Please enter the average production time. Numbers only.

state.title: State
state.inputTitle: It must be 1-50 characters and can only contain letters and hyphens.

city.title: City
city.inputTitle: It must be 1-50 characters and can only contain letters and hyphens.

street.title: Street Address
street.inputTitle: It must be 1-100 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, comma, hash, and parentheses

street2.title: Street Address 2
street2.inputTitle: It must be 1-100 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, comma, hash, and parentheses

postal.title: Postal Code
postal.inputTitle: It must be 1-10 characters and can only contain letters.

catalog.title: Company Brochure
catalog.desc: PDF only. Maximum upload file size :10MB

history.title: Company History
history.inputTitle: It must be less than 25000 digits.
history.placeholder:
1984 : B brand founded
2000 : Management buyout from C and merged with D 
2005 : E leads a management buyout of the Group as CEO, backed by F
2009 : Group opens Chinese facility
2013 : LED lighting range is launched Group’s Chinese facility expanded
2015 : Group achieves sales of $100m for the first time Offices opened in United States
2016 : Group’s Chinese facility is expanded to 52,500 square metres Offices opened in Hong Kong and Spain

save.title: Confirm and Save
save.desc: Please confirm the information above before you save it. Company information will be updated immediately.

domain.title: Customize your domain.
domain.inputTitle: It must be 3-50 and can only contain letters, and numbers.

logo.title: Edit Logo
logo.desc: Your company's identity is visually expressed through its logo.

cover.title: Edit Company Cover Image
cover.desc:
Cover images will be located at the top of your company page.
The first one will be the main cover image. You can upload up to 8 images.
cover.caution: Optimize your cover photo for the right dimensions: 1280 pixels wide and 487 pixels tall.

domain.success: Your domain has been updated successfully.
domain.fail: The domain is taken. Please try another.

image.success: Your photo has been updated successfully.
image.fail: Photo update failed. Please try again.
image.upTo8: You can select up to 8 images.
